Miraculous Cure All Elixir

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 329
disease healer [autodishealer]: 1

Requires 40N to forge (N5)

This elixir is brewed from magic leaves of very strong potency. Drinking the brew will cure a person from any known disease. After being used, it is refilled with water and, after a month, the leaves will have turned the water into another miraculous elixir.
